definition: Altai mountain range in Xinjiang and Siberia
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Altai mountain chain on the border of Russia and Mongolia

sentences.english: The Mengku region is located at the southern foot of the Altay Mountains to the north of the Junggar basin.
sentences.chinese: 新疆蒙庫地區位於阿爾泰山南麓，南接準噶爾盆地。

sentences.english: Huh, you also know there are gold mines in the Altay Mountains?
sentences.chinese: 哦，你也知道阿爾泰山有金礦啊？

sentences.english: On the Altai the antler deer breeding has become widespread.
sentences.chinese: 在阿爾泰山，人們大面積地養殖這種有角的鹿。

sentences.english: The major active faults of Altai Mountains in backland of Asian continent are introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中介紹了位於亞洲腹地阿爾泰山地區的活動斷裂。

sentences.english: The spring of the Altay Mountains comes later, but as lovely as other places' spring.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾泰山的春天來的遲，但春天該有的一樣都不少。

sentences.english: Khoomei is still popular among the Mongolians living in the Altai mountain areas, Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 新疆阿爾泰山區的蒙古人中，至今尚有呼麥流傳。
